trans-unit.source: Provides a type to describe a property on a resource.
trans-unit.target: 提供型別來描述屬性在資源上。

trans-unit.source: The following Unicode characters are allowed in XML names but not in identifiers in EDM: 1.
trans-unit.target: XML 名稱中，但不是在 EDM 中的識別項中允許下列 Unicode 字元︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: U+212E '℮' If your property names can contain these characters, make sure that they are escaped properly in your provider implementation.
trans-unit.target: U +&212;E '℮' 如果您的屬性名稱可以包含這些字元，請確定，它們有適當逸出提供者實作中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName%2A> method will not properly escape these invalid EDM characters."
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName%2A>方法將不會適當逸出這些無效的 EDM 字元。"</xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceProperty"></xref> for an open property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新<xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceProperty"></xref>開放式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following Unicode characters are allowed in XML names but not in identifiers in EDM: 1.
trans-unit.target: XML 名稱中，但不是在 EDM 中的識別項中允許下列 Unicode 字元︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: U+212E '℮' If your property names can contain these characters, make sure that they are escaped properly in your provider implementation.
trans-unit.target: U +&212;E '℮' 如果您的屬性名稱可以包含這些字元，請確定，它們有適當逸出提供者實作中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName%2A> method will not properly escape these invalid EDM characters."
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName%2A>方法將不會適當逸出這些無效的 EDM 字元。"</xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Property name for the property as string.
trans-unit.target: 當做字串之屬性的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourcePropertyKind"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourcePropertyKind"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType"></xref> of the resource to which the property refers.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType"> </xref>屬性所參考的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this property can be accessed through reflection on the declaring resource instance type.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可以透過宣告資源執行個體類型的反射存取此屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the CanReflectOnInstanceTypeProperty property returns `true`, the data service runtime uses reflection to get the property information on the declaring.<xref:System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType.InstanceType%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType>.
trans-unit.target: 當 CanReflectOnInstanceTypeProperty 屬性傳回`true`，資料服務執行階段使用反映來取得屬性有關的宣告。<xref:System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType.InstanceType%2A>的<xref:System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType>。</xref:System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType> </xref:System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType.InstanceType%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the CanReflectOnInstanceTypeProperty property returns `false`, the data service runtime uses the <xref:System.Data.Services.Providers.IDataServiceQueryProvider> interface to get or set this property value.
trans-unit.target: 當 CanReflectOnInstanceTypeProperty 屬性傳回`false`，資料服務執行階段會使用<xref:System.Data.Services.Providers.IDataServiceQueryProvider>介面，以取得或設定這個屬性值。</xref:System.Data.Services.Providers.IDataServiceQueryProvider>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the property can be accessed through reflection; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>當存取屬性，透過反映來;否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets custom state information about a resource property that is defined by the developer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資源內容開發人員所定義的自訂狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: State information.
trans-unit.target: 狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，指出屬性是否為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Gets the kind of the resource property with regard to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 取得與資源相關之資源屬性的種類。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourcePropertyKind"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourcePropertyKind"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets MIME type for the property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性的 MIME 類型。

trans-unit.source: Null MIME type is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 未指定 null 的 MIME 類型。

trans-unit.source: String value that indicates MIME type.
trans-unit.target: 字串值，指出 MIME 類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the resource property.
trans-unit.target: 取得資源屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource property as string.
trans-unit.target: 當做字串之資源屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the resource property.
trans-unit.target: 取得資源屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType"></xref> of the resource property.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType"> </xref>資源屬性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the resource property to read-only.
trans-unit.target: 將資源屬性設定為唯讀。
